importantArticles.headline: Markets (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) are ticking higher, but recent volatility tied to trade policy is prompting some investors to play defense. Rational Equity Fund portfolio manager Joe Tigay joins Catalysts to explain why he's turning to value plays like Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) as a top pick in uncertain times. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
importantArticles.title: Berkshire Hathaway is top defensive pick, portfolio manager says

importantArticles.headline: Political tension and uncertainty surrounding tariffs have taken a toll on the stock market in recent weeks, as prices have crashed, rebounded, and then dipped yet again in a matter of days.  Consumer confidence continues to decline, with the Expectations Index -- which measures consumers' outlooks on factors like income and the labor market -- falling to its lowest point in 12 years.  With recession risks still high, consumer confidence could drop even further.
importantArticles.title: Should You Really Invest in the Stock Market Right Now? Here's What History Suggests.
